chapter.text: 19|1|Kapha-ha-iya-‘a'ina-sada [1]
19|2|eta apanara rabera anugrahera bibarana tamra banda yakariyyara [1] prati
19|3|yakhana tini tara rabake dekechilena nibhrte [1]
19|4|tini balechilena, ‘he amara raba! Amara asthi durbala hayeche [1], bardhakye amara matha subhrojjala hayeche [2]; he amara raba! Apanake deke ami kakhano byarthakama ha'ini [3].
19|5|‘Ara ami asanka kari amara para amara sagotriyadera samparke, amara stri bandha. Kaje'i apani apanara kacha theke amake dana karuna uttaradhikari
19|6|‘ye amara uttaradhikaritta karabe [1] ebam uttaradhikaritta karabe iya’kubera bansera [2] ebam he amara raba! Take karabena santosabhajana.
19|7|Tini balalena, ‘he yakariyya! Amara apanake eka putra santanera susambada dicchi, tara nama habe iyaha'iya; e name age amara karo namakarana [1] karini.
19|8|Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Kemana kare amara putra habe yakhana amara stri bandhya o ami bardhakyera sesa simaya upanita!’
19|9|Tini balalena, ‘erupa'i habe. Apanara raba balalena, eta amara jan'ya sahaja; ami to age apanake srsti karechi yakhana apani kichu'i chilena na [1].
19|10|Yakariyya balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake ekati nidarsana dina.’ Tini balalena, ‘apanara nidarsana e ye, apani sustha [1] thaka sattbe'o karo sathe tina dina kathabarta balabena na.’
19|11|Tarapara tini (‘ibadatera jan'ya nirdista) kaksa hate bera haye tara sampradayera kache asalena ebam ingite taderake sakala-sandhaya allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana karate balalena.
19|12|He iyaha'iya![1] Apani kitabatike drrhatara sathe grahana karuna. Ara amara take saisabe'i dana karechilama prajna [2].
19|13|Ebam amadera kacha theke hrdayera komalata [1] o pabitrata; ara tini chilena muttaki.
19|14|Pita-matara anugata ebam tini chilena na ud'dhata o abadhya [1].
19|15|Ara tara prati sasti yedina tini janma labha karena, yedina tara mrtyu habe ebam yedina tini jibita abasthaya ut'thita habena [1].
19|16|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe mara'iyamake, yakhana se tara paribarabarga theke prthaka haye niralaya purba dike eka sthane asraya nila [1]
19|17|atahpara se tadera nikata theke nijeke arala karala. Takhana amara tara kache amadera ruhake pathalama, se tara nikata purna manabakrtite atmaprakasa karala [1].
19|18|Mara'iyama balala, ami tomara theke dayamayera asraya prarthana karachi (allahke bhaya kara) yadi tumi ‘muttaki’ ha'o [1].
19|19|Se balala, ami to tomara rabera duta, tomake eka pabitra putra dana karara jan'ya [1].
19|20|Mara'iyama balala, ‘kemana kare amara putra habe yakhana amake kono purusa sparsa kareni ebam ami byabhicarini'o na'i?’

19|21|Se balala, ‘e rupa'i habe. Tomara raba balechena, ‘eta amara jan'ya sahaja. Ara amara take ejan'ye srsti karaba yena se haya manusera jan'ya eka nidarsana [1] o amadera kacha theke eka anugraha; eta to eka sthirikrta byapara.’
19|22|Atahpara se take garbhe dharana karala ebam ta saha durera eka sthane cale gela [1].
19|23|Atahpara prasaba-bedana take eka khejura-gachera nice asraya nite badhya karala. Se balala, ‘haya, era age yadi ami mare yetama [1] ebam manusera smrti theke sampurna hariye yetama.
19|24|Takhana phirisata tara nica theke deke take balala, ‘tumi peresana hayo na [1], tomara padadese tomara raba eka nahara srsti karechena [2]
19|25|‘ara tumi tomara dike khejura-gachera kande nara da'o, seta tomara upara taja-paka khejura phelabe.

19|26|‘Kaje'i kha'o, pana kara ebam cokha jura'o. Atahpara manusera madhye ka'uke'o yadi tumi dekha takhana balo, ami dayamayera uddese maunata abalambanera manata karechi [1]. Kaje'i aja ami kichute'i kono manusera sathe kathabarta balabo na [2]
19|27|tarapara se santanake niye tara sampradayera kache upasthita hala; tara balala, ‘he mara'iyama! Tumi to eka aghatana kare basecha [1].
19|28|‘He harunera bona! [1] Tomara pita asat byakti chila na ebam tomara ma'o chila na byabhicarini [2].
19|29|Takhana mara'iyama santanera prati ingita karala. Tara balala, ‘ye kalera sisu tara sathe amara kemana kare katha balaba?’
19|30|Tini balalena, ‘ami to allahara banda. Tini amake kitaba diyechena, amake nabi karechena
19|31|‘yekhane'i ami thaki na kena tini amake barakatamaya [1] karechena, tini amake nirdesa diyechena yatadina jibita thaki tatadina salata o yakata adaya karate [2]
19|32|‘ara amake amara mayera prati anugata karechena ebam tini amake karenani ud'dhata, hatabhagya
19|33|‘Amara prati santi yedina ami janma labha karechi [1], yedina amara mrtyu habe ebam yedina jibita abasthaya ami ut'thita haba.
19|34|E-i mara'iyamera putra isa. Ami balalama satya katha, ye bisaye tara sandeha posana karache [1].
19|35|Allah emana nana ye, kono santana grahana karabena, tini pabitra mahimamaya. Tini yakhana kichu sthira karena, takhana setara jan'ya balena, ‘ha'o’ tate'i ta haye yaya.
19|36|Ara niscaya'i allah amara raba o tomadera raba; kaje'i tomara tamra ibadata kara, eta'i sarala patha [1].
19|37|Atahpara dalagulo nijedera madhye matanaikya srsti karala [1], kaje'i durbhoga kapheradera jan'ya mahadibasa pratyaksakale [2].
19|38|Tara yedina amadera kache asabe sedina tara kata camatkara sunabe o dekhabe [1]! Kintu yalemara aja spasta bibhrantite ache.’
19|39|Ara taderake satarka kare dina paritapera dina [1] sambandhe, yakhana saba sid'dhanta haye yabe. Athaca tara rayeche gaphalatite nimajjita ebam tara imana anache na.
19|40|Niscaya yamina o tara upara yara ache tadera curanta malikana amadera'i ra'ibe ebam amadera'i kache tara pratyabartita habe [1].
19|41|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe ibarahimake [1]; tini to chilena eka satyanistha [2] nabi.
19|42|Yakhana tini tara pitake balalena, ‘he amara pita! Apani tara ibadata karena kena ye suna na, dekhe na ebam apanara kono kaje'i ase na?’
19|43|‘He amara pita! Amara kache to eseche jnana ya apanara kache aseni; kaje'i amara anusarana karuna, ami apanake sathika patha dekhaba.
19|44|‘He amara pita! Sayatanera ibadata karabena na [1]. Sayatana to dayamayera abadhya.
19|45|‘He amara pita! Niscaya ami asanka karachi ye, apanake dayamayera sasti sparsa karabe, takhana apani haye parabena sayatanera bandhu.

19|46|Pita balala, ‘he ibarahima! Tumi ki amara upasyadera theke bimukha? Yadi tumi birata na ha'o tabe abasya'i ami patharera aghate tomara prana nasa karaba; ara tumi ciratare amake tyaga kare cale ya'o.
19|47|Ibarahima balalena, ‘apanara prati salama [1]. Ami apanara rabera kache apanara jan'ya ksama prarthana karaba [2], niscaya tini amara prati khuba'i anugrahasila.
19|48|‘Ara ami tomadera theke o tomara allah chara yadera ibadata kara tadera theke prthaka hacchi; ara ami amara rabake dakachi; asa kari ami amara rabake deke ami durbhaga haba na.

19|49|Atahpara tini yakhana tadera theke o tara allah chara yadera ‘ibadata karata sesaba theke prthaka haye gelena, takhana amara take dana karalama isahaka o iya’kuba enam pratyekake nabi karalama [1].
19|50|Ebam taderake amara dana karalama amadera anugraha, ara tadera nama-yasa samucca karalama.
19|51|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe musake, tini chilena bisesa manonita [1] ebam tini chilena rasula, nabi.
19|52|Ara take amara dekechilama tura parbatera dana dika theke [1] ebam amara antaranga alape take naikatya dana karechilama.
19|53|Ara amara nija anugrahe take dilama tara bha'i harunake nabirupe.
19|54|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe isama'ilake, tini to chilena pratisruti palane satyasrayi [1] ebam tini chilena rasula, nabi
19|55|tini tara parijanabargake salata o yakatera nirdesa ditena [1] ebam tini chilena tara rabera santosabhajana.
19|56|Ara smarana karuna e kitabe idarisake, tini chilena satyanistha nabi
19|57|ara amara take unnita karechilama ucca maryadaya [1].

19|58|Era'i tara, nabidera madhye allah yaderake anugraha karechena, adamera bansa theke ebam yaderake amara nuhera sathe naukaya arohana kariyechilama. Ara ibarahima o isara'ilera bansodbhuta, ara yaderake amara hedayata diyechilama ebam manonita karechilama; tadera kache dayamayera ayata tila'oyata kara hale tara lutiye parata sajadaya [1] ebam kannaya [2].
19|59|Tadera pare asalo ayogya uttarasurira [1], tara salata nasta karala [2] ebam ku-prabrttira [3] anubarti hala. Kaje'i acire'i tara ksatigrastatara [4] sam'mukhina habe.
19|60|Kintu tara naya--- yara ta'oba kareche, imana eneche o satkaja kareche. Tara to jannate prabesa karabe. Ara tadera prati kono yuluma habe na.
19|61|Eta sthayi jannata, ye gayebi pratisrati dayamaya tamra bandaderake diyechena [1]. Niscaya tamra pratisruta bisaya asabe'i.
19|62|Sekhane tara ‘salama’ tatha santi chara an'ya kono asara bakya sunabe na [1] ebam sekhane sakala sandhya tadera jan'ya thakabe tadera riyika [2].
19|63|E se jannata, yara adhikari karaba amara amadera bandadera madhye muttakiderake [1].
19|64|‘Ara amara apanara rabera adesa chara abatarana kari na [1]; ya amadera samane o pichane ache o ya e du’yera antarbarti ta tamra'i. Ara apanara raba bismrta hana na [2].’

19|65|Tini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti ya kichu ache, se sabera raba. Kaje'i tamra'i ibadata karuna ebam tamra ibadate dhairyasila thakuna [1]. Apani ki tamra samanamagunasampanna ka'uke'o janena [2]
19|66|ara manusa bale, ‘amara mrtyu hale ami ki jibita abasthaya ut'thita haba?’
19|67|Manusa ki smarana kare na ye, amara take age srsti karechi yakhana se kichu'i chila na [1]
19|68|kaje'i sapatha apanara rabera! Amara to taderake o sayatanaderake ekatre samabeta karaba'i [1] tarapara amara natajanu abasthaya jahannamera caradike taderake upasthita karaba'i [2].
19|69|Tarapara pratyeka dalera madhye ye dayamayera sarbadhika abadhya amara take tene bera karaba'i [1].
19|70|Tarapara amara to tadera madhye jahanname dagdha ha'oyara yara sabaceye besi yogya tadera bisaya bhala jani.
19|71|Ara tomadera pratyeke'i tara (jahannamera) upara diye'i atikrama karabe [1], eta apanara rabera anibarya sid'dhanta.
19|72|Pare amara ud'dhara karaba taderake, yara taka'oya abalambana kareche ebam yalemaderake sekhane natajanu abasthaya rekhe deba.
19|73|Ara tadera kache amadera spasta ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara hale kapherara muminaderake bale, du’dalera madhye kara maryadaya sresthatara o majalisa hisebe uttama [1]
19|74|ara tadera age amara bahu manabagosthike binasa karechi---yara tadera ceye sampada o bahyadrstite srestha chila.

19|75|Baluna, ‘yara bibhrantite ache, dayamaya taderake pracura abakasa debena yataksana na tara ye bisaye taderake satarka kara hacche ta dekhabe; ta sasti hoka ba keyamata'i hoka [1]. Atahpara tara janate parabe ke maryadaya nikrsta o ke dalabale durbala.
19|76|Ara yara satpathe cale allah tadera hedayata brd'dhi kare dena [1]; ebam sthayi satkaja samuha [2] apanara rabera puraskara praptira jan'ya srestha ebam parinatira dika diye'o ati uttama.
19|77|Apani ki jenechena (ebam ascarya hayechena) se byakti samparke, ye amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kare ebam bale, ‘amake abasya'i dhana-sampada o santana-santati deya habe [1].
19|78|Se ki gayeba dekhe niyeche, naki dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti labha kareche
19|79|kakhana'i naya, se ya bale amara ta likhe rakhaba ebam tamra sasti brd'dha'i karate thakaba [1].
19|80|Ara se ya bale ta thakabe amadera adhikare [1] ebam se amadera kache asabe eka.
19|81|Ara tara allah chara an'ya bahu ilaha grahana kareche, yate ora tadera sahaya haya [1]
19|82|Kakhana'i naya, ora to tadera ibadata asbikara karabe ebam tadera birodhi haye yabe [1].
19|83|Apani ki laksya karenani ye, amara kapheradera jan'ya sayatanaderake chere rekhechi, taderake manda kaje bisesabhabe pralubdha karara jan'ya [1]
19|84|kaje'i tadera bisaye apani taratari karabena na. Amara to gunachi tadera nirdharita kala [1]
19|85|yedina dayamayera nikata muttakiganake sam'manita mehamanarupe [1] amara samabeta karaba
19|86|ebam aparadhiderake trsnatura abasthaya jahannamera dike hamkiye niye yabo.
19|87|Yara dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti niyeche, tara chara ke'u suparisa karara malika habe na [1].
19|88|Ara tara bale, ‘dayamaya santana grahana karechena’.
19|89|Tomara to emana eka bibhatsa bisayera abatarana karacha
19|90|yate asamanasamuha bidirna haye ya'oyara upakrama haya, ara yamina khanda-bikhanda ebam parbatamandali curna-bicurna haye apatita habe
19|91|e jan'ya ye, tara dayamayera prati santana arapa kare [1].
19|92|Athaca santana grahana kara dayamayera jan'ya sobhana naya
19|93|asamanasamuha o yamine emana ke'u ne'i, ye dayamayera kache bandarupe upasthita habe na.
19|94|Tini tadera sankhya janena ebam tini taderake bisesabhabe gune rekhechena [1].
19|95|Ara kiyamatera dina tadera saba'i tamra kache asabe ekaki abasthaya.
19|96|Niscaya yara imana ane o satkaja kare dayamaya abasya'i tadera jan'ya srsti karena bhalabasa [1].
19|97|Ara amara to apanara jabanite kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi yate apani ta dbara muttakiderake susambada dite parena ebam bitandapriya sampradayake ta dbara satarka karate parena.
19|98|Ara tadera age amara bahu prajanmake binasa karechi! Apani ki tadera karo astitba anubhaba karena athaba ksinatama sabda'o sunate pana [1]
